name: Cover Fowl
description:
It's time to get stylish!

Cover Fowl is a game about dressing, posing and customising an avian model ready for their big photo op!

Alter appearance!

Many controls for colors, patterns, beaks, eyes and more!

Dress up!

Pick from a range of torso and bottom styles, colours and graphics.

Strike a pose!

Choose from a selection of striking poses, and position the bird for their photo.

Customise Client!

Pick from a few different backgrounds and frames to simulate being a front-page star.

Disclaimer

This "game" is driven solely by your own imagination, there are no quests, missions, objectives or story. It is simply a short game for creating fun little images.

Usage Guide

Use the tabs on the top-left of the screen to switch between the different customisable sections: model, outfit, frame and pose.

Use the arrows and sliders to alter the appearance of the avian. Red, blue and green sliders change those colors respectively.

Use the buttons on the bottom left to view simple information, toggle the music, or quit the game.

Take a photo with the big red camera button below the right preview. This will be saved to your "My Pictures" folder, or equivalent, under "CoverFowl".

Tweet or share your pictures online, and be sure to tag me in them: @baronnobody on social media, or use the hashtag #coverfowl.
